transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan Jatin ji kya haal hai aapke kaise ho aap?
Customer: Kaun bol rahe ho?
Executive: Preeti Rathore baat kar rahi hu India Mart head office se.
Customer: Haan boliye na.
Executive: Accha hamara discussion us din hua tha to maine ek bar fir se aapke regard mein aage baat ki thi but sir wahi fir se conclude hua ki usme kuch ho nahi payega matlab we cannot do anything in that scenario.
Customer: Koi baat nahi.
Executive: To kuch bacha nahi hai sir uske alava matlab mere paas me bhi karne ke liye.
Customer: Koi baat nahi mam.
Executive: Aur baki bataiye baki.
Customer: Baki aapki rahi hai par par kuch kar nahi pa rahi hu main isme matlab kuch actually legally bhi possible hai nahi na usme to kya kar payenge.
Executive: Aapki team nahi kar pa rahi hai to hum log uske bare mein koi baat karne ka.
Executive: Hamari team bhi ha sir wahi main bol rahi hu ki usme kuch ho hi nahi sakta maine multiple bar idhar udhar sab jagah se har matlab through India Mart out of the box India Mart har tarike se I have tried but kahi conclude hota ya beech me koi midway nikal ke nahi aaya until unless if any action customer can directly take there bas yahi last me conclude hua hai jahan se bhi maine discussion kiya ya pata kiya isliye mere ko ek din lag gaya pura aapko wapas call back karne me to usme to kuch ho nahi ho payega baki fir aap apna service wagera use karo aur khush rahega to you are having my number aap mujhe coordinate kar lena theek hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi abhi koi service use karne ka meaning nahi raha mam mera isliye.
Executive: Kyu aap apni service ko use karo apni service kyu inkar karoge sir aur apna buyer aapke paas me to acche amount me lead inquiry call sab aa raha hai aapke paas me.
Customer: Wo to aayega na mam dekho wo to aayega wo to wo to seedhi baat hai wo to aap karenge ya nahi karenge aap denge ya nahi denge to bhi jo mera kam hai wo to hone wala hai okay mere ko jo problem face ho raha tha wo bhi hum logo ne pehli bar aapko ye concern aapko bataya hai itne salon ke baad.
Executive: Mujhe to pehle bhi bataya hai sir mujhe jab jab bataya tha maine hamesha resolution ke sath hi aapko call kiya hoga aur is bar bhi mere end se I have given the best ki main kahi se kuch resolve kar pau isme but iske kuch solution hai nahi sometime dekho sir.
Customer: Haan wo to wahi bol raha hu na ek minute chal rakhna main ek customer hai usko call kar.
Executive: Ji ji koi nahi koi nahi aap answer kar lo ha ha.
Customer: Sir main aapko call karta hu ha.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Actually kya hai mam dekho wo baat aapke end se kya hai kya nahi hai wo to mere liye koi meaning nahi hai as a customer okay as a aap meri jagah pe aa jaiye aur main aapki jagah pe aa jata hu okay to usme dekhunga na to ye case matlab ki matlab bol nahi sakte samjho.
Executive: Sir maine wahi bola tha ki sir dekho as a kyuki aap se meri purani matlab.
Customer: Kyuki iska.
Executive: Sari baat chit hai aur purani sari cheeze maine aapko conclude karke di hai aapne mere paas me approach kiya I really appreciate.
Customer: Aapne usi time pe bhi bola tha maine dekho maine Satyajit Tiwari jab mere ko approach kiye the first time se tab mere ko usne jo galat kiya jo hua wo baat main abhi yaad karunga to koi meaning nahi hai right fir aapne baat kiya aapne trust diya to humne socha koi chalo koi baat nahi aur wo bhi mera trust seal tal raha tha to bhi main maximize service liya kyu.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Kyuki chalo kal hoke aaj nahi to kal accha hoga okay par actually aap India ko bhi business ke terms me aapko growth mili hai India Mart se matlab jaise pehle jo trust seal me aata tha.
Executive: Dekho main sach me mila.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not satisfied with IndiaMART services.

- Customer wants resolution for an issue.



Resolution:

- Executive explained that nothing can be done.

- Executive suggested using services and coordinating if needed.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, services, resolution, trustseal
